name: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance
overview: You are a male player, who wants to undress your woman opponent playing cards. In 5-card poker, you bet own money for a round and if you are lucky, then collect winnings and watch your opponent undress. Your opponent removes clothing every time she loses one hundred dollars. You must make her strip five times to win. The little-known Mac port of Artworx's first Strip Poker game featured MacPaint-style graphics unique to this conversion.
